sen.j: 屋号は1846年（弘化3年）に山階宮家から賜ったもので、「茶ひとつを保つ」の意。
sen.e: Its trade name "Ippodo," which was bestowed on by Yamashinano-miya Imperial Family in 1846, implies "to maintain nothing but tea business."
